package sakila

type Actor struct {
	ActorId          int64
	FirstName        string
	LastName         string
	FullName         string
	FullNameReversed string
	LastUpdate       time.Time
}

type Address struct {
	AddressId  int64
	Address    string
	Address2   string
	District   string
	CityId     int64
	PostalCode string
	Phone      string
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Category struct {
	CategoryId int64
	Name       string
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type City struct {
	CityId     int64
	City       string
	CountryId  int64
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Country struct {
	CountryId  int64
	Country    string
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Customer struct {
	CustomerId int64
	StoreId    int64
	FirstName  string
	LastName   string
	Email      string
	AddressId  int64
	Active     int64
	CreateDate time.Time
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Department struct {
	DepartmentId [16]byte
	Name         string
}

type Employee struct {
	EmployeeId [16]byte
	Name       string
	Title      string
	ManagerId  [16]byte
}

type EmployeeDepartment struct {
	EmployeeId   [16]byte
	DepartmentId [16]byte
}

type Film struct {
	FilmId             int64
	Title              string
	Description        string
	ReleaseYear        int64
	LanguageId         int64
	OriginalLanguageId int64
	RentalDuration     int64
	RentalRate         float64
	Length             int64
	ReplacementCost    float64
	Rating             string
	SpecialFeatures    map[string]any
	LastUpdate         time.Time
}

type FilmActor struct {
	ActorId    int64
	FilmId     int64
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type FilmCategory struct {
	FilmId     int64
	CategoryId int64
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type FilmText struct {
	Title       any
	Description any
	FilmText    any
	Rank        any
}

type Inventory struct {
	InventoryId int64
	FilmId      int64
	StoreId     int64
	LastUpdate  time.Time
}

type Language struct {
	LanguageId int64
	Name       string
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Payment struct {
	PaymentId   int64
	CustomerId  int64
	StaffId     int64
	RentalId    int64
	Amount      float64
	PaymentDate time.Time
	LastUpdate  time.Time
}

type Rental struct {
	RentalId    int64
	RentalDate  time.Time
	InventoryId int64
	CustomerId  int64
	ReturnDate  time.Time
	StaffId     int64
	LastUpdate  time.Time
}

type Staff struct {
	StaffId    int64
	FirstName  string
	LastName   string
	AddressId  int64
	Picture    []byte
	Email      string
	StoreId    int64
	Active     int64
	Username   string
	Password   string
	LastUpdate time.Time
}

type Store struct {
	StoreId        int64
	ManagerStaffId int64
	AddressId      int64
	LastUpdate     time.Time
}

type Task struct {
	TaskId       [16]byte
	EmployeeId   [16]byte
	DepartmentId [16]byte
	Task         string
	Data         map[string]any
}
